entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
